attributes.action: Call a general election to afford the British people their democratic right to vote on MPs expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I call on Mr Brown to restore integrity to the political system in the United Kingdom by dissolving parliament and calling a general election immediately.  This would allow the British people to express their feelings on MPs expenses in the proper democratic manner at the ballot box.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
